column5: Hey guys this is my cousin Marvin's blog, I'm sure some of you have heard about it, it's been everywhere, well I'm just posting this up, maybe he can get a few more readers, and I figured you guys would get a kick out of it.  http://durhamregion.typepad.com/simplyput/2010/04/a-new-candidate-for-clarington.html  Thanks!  Charles.
Ha! Very funny. I thoroughly enjoyed that. Thanks!  p.-
